alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 2:59PM CST until March 10 at 4:40AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Denton Creek Near Justin. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch lands near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.2 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
